Issues.Title: Remove StructCache
Issues.Body: Follow-up to #791. I will rebase this change after the change from @hughbe is merged.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "Remove StructCache" (#818)

Issues.Title: Fix TableLayoutPanelCellPositionConverter.CreateInstance validation
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Fix TableLayoutPanelCellPositionConverter.CreateInstance validation" (#789)

Issues.Title: Add Timer tests and fix Debug assert failure
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR " Add Timer tests and fix Debug assert failure" (#790)

Issues.Title: [Design Discussion] Standardise on `(X)GetService(typeof(X))` or `GetService(typeof(X)) as X`
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "[Design Discussion] Standardise on `(X)GetService(typeof(X))` or `GetService(typeof(X)) as X`" (#817)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor encounters problems if `GetExtenders` returns invalid items
Issues.Body:
- E.g. `null`
- E.g. `new Type[] { null }`
- E.g. `new Type[] { typeof(object) }`
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor encounters problems if `GetExtenders` returns invalid items" (#816)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor.PaintValue(null) throws NRE should be a nop
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor.PaintValue(null) throws NRE should be a nop" (#815)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor.LoadFromStream(null) throws NRE should be ANE
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor.LoadFromStream(null) throws NRE should be ANE" (#814)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor.CreateFilterEntry(null) throws NRE should be ANE
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor.CreateFilterEntry(null) throws NRE should be ANE" (#813)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor.CreateExtensionsString should skip empty/null strings
Issues.Body: Otherwise, we can get strings like `"*.x,,*.y` which is not valid
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor.CreateExtensionsString should skip empty/null strings" (#812)

Issues.Title: ImageEditor enumerates `GetExtensions` multiple times
Issues.Body:
Should only read the array once, for perf as well as to make sure we enumerate the same array

- CreateFilterEntry
- EditValue
- GetExtensions
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ImageEditor enumerates `GetExtensions` multiple times" (#811)

Issues.Title: Add ImageEditor tests
Issues.Body:
Fixes #816
Fixes #815
Fixes #814
Fixes #813
Fixes #812 
Fixes #811 
Fixes #762
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "Add ImageEditor tests" (#810)

Issues.Title: Consider keyboard shortcut to opt in/opt out of tooltips on keyboard navigation
Issues.Body: At this moment keyboard tooltips are enabled by default, but it maybe more comfortable for users to be able to opt in/opt out of tooltips on keyboard navigation.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Consider keyboard shortcut to opt in/opt out of tooltips on keyboard navigation" (#802)
